page.title: 15Local History
page.content: The second time we visited Arkley we wanted to know if the piggery was still there. Mr. Brettingham saw a lady doing her garden and she came to the fence and told us that the piggery had gone. She then went in and brought out some biscuits and we shared them out equally. While we were eating the biscuits the lady said we were "splendid chaps". Her name was Miss Rowley and she lives at Rose Cottage. We asked her if her name had anything to do with Rowley Lane in Arkley. She said, no but her father used to say it was very useful when he wanted credit! We wrote to Miss Rowley and said thank you.
